predicate.note: Frames file for 'wallow' based on sentence in financial subcorpus (there are only 4 in the entire treebank corpus). Verbnet entry 31.3.

example.name: adverbial phrase as loc
example.text: Magna recently cut its quarterly dividend in half and the company's Class A shares are wallowing far below their 52-week high of 16.125 Canadian dollars [US$ 13.73].
example.arg: far below their 52-week high of 16.125 Canadian dollars [US$ 13.73]

example.name: prepositional phrase as loc
example.text: John is forever wallowing in self-pity.
